XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle local_ai_functions plugin

TABLE.NAME: local_ai_functions_agents
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores configurations for different AI function app agents.

FIELD.NAME: agent_key
FIELD.COMMENT: A unique short key for the agent configuration, e.g., 'chemistry_ai'

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The display name for the agent, e.g., 'Chemistry AI Functions'

FIELD.NAME: endpoint
FIELD.COMMENT: The base endpoint URL for the Azure Function App, e.g., 'https://app.azurewebsites.net/api/'

FIELD.NAME: config_data
FIELD.COMMENT: A JSON object holding the individual function names and their keys.
